Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Bucks run groomed for classic and skate in great condition from building and back.Coyote and Cedar trace groomed this morning for both classic and skate.i did not ski Hawk hills.

Stoney Creek Metropark (Shelby Township).conditions: [ ] groomed[ ] golf course is about as good as it gets[ ] Sheldon trails - fair to  good littered with tree parts, though the usual being trod upon[ ] icy patches under trees where not enough snow made it to the groun)d as it got colder and the rain - wet snow turned to ( oops - repost -- rain >>> snow

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Seriously great grooming and firm snow depth on Nubs upper Red & Blue loops . I wished I had LF6 instead of my LF7 as the temps were in the low teens : but it was a delightful ski in the sunshine .

nubsNob.xcTrails: Groomed and tracked. Conditions are very good.
nubsNob.comments: Conditions continue to feel like the middle of winter. The snow surface is machine groomed with a dusting of fresh snow. The breeze is up from the West today and scattered snow is predicted this morning. All of the runs on the Front and South Side are open with the exception of the Big Terrain Park. Piles of snow are being pushed on Pintail Peak as we prepare to open this area on Friday, December 19. The soup of the day is shrimp corn chowder. The lifts will spin today from 9 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
